feature.label: JKind Eclipse Plug-in
feature.description:
Lustre Plug-in for Eclipse with JKind Analysis Support
This plug-in provides a Lustre front-end in Eclipse with syntax checking, highlighting, type checking, and other syntatic checks. These plug-ins also provide a convenient way to launch JKind on a Lustre file and have the results reported back in a real-time graphical display. Excel formatted counterexamples viewable by right-clicking on individual properties.
